ee:transform.doc:name: filtragem dos dados do payload do customer

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { name: payload.name, last_name: payload.last_name, date_of_birth: payload.date_of_birth, address: payload.address, identity_card: payload.identity_card, date_of_creation: now() }

db:insert.doc:name: insert na base de dados do customer
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO customers (name, last_name, date_of_birth, address, identity_card, date_of_creation) VALUES (:name, :last_name, :date_of_birth, :address, :identity_card, :date_of_creation);
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{ name: payload.name, last_name: payload.last_name, date_of_birth: payload.date_of_birth, address: payload.address, identity_card: payload.identity_card, date_of_creation: now() }]
